https://tinyurl.com/acnh-sheet: Download the latest version of the sheet (12/24) - You must reupload this to Drive to see the images
THIS IS NOT THE PLACE TO REQUEST EDIT ACCESS. If you want to help, join our Discord using the link below.

Hi, welcome to the item spreadsheet for ACNH!

Update 12/24: Unlocked toy day items, added new column called Season/Event Exclusive for obtainability outside of the respective season, removed Unlock Notes and Mannequin Piece columns, added new sort column to reactions tab, minor changes and fixes all around.

Update 12/04: Fix some regressions regarding source notes introduced in the last update. Add a "Festive shopping" season used for some Able Sisters items that were wrongly assigned to the "ornaments" crafting season. Add "Mannequin Season" column (overrides Able Sisters' seasons). Mannequin Piece column will be removed soon.

Update 12/03: Add new Seasons and Events tab with relevant dates. Most tabs now have new Season/Event columns to match items to their respective events. Source Notes will be updated soon to remove redundant season/event info. Unlock Notes columns will soon be removed (but not the "Unlocked?" column) â€” BCAT and NTP unlock details will now reside in the Seasons and Events tab in a more structured manner.

The purpose of our spreadsheet is to create a complete collection of data on items, villagers, achievements, and more! We fully welcome the use of our data for creators to make websites or applications from for the betterment of the Animal Crossing community. If you use our data for an app or site, please provide a link back to the spreadsheet on your page, and contact us to get your name added to the list of partners.
Spreadsheet Discord (report issues, find resources, or stop by and say hi!)

Abbreviations/Spreadsheet Help

NFS = Not for sale
NA = Not available or unsellable, you must trash items with NA in the sell tab instead of selling
VFX = Visual effects for wallpaper and flooring, such as animation
